AddProfileKey.name: AddProfileKey
AddProfileKey.description: Grants permission to add a profile key

CreateDomain.name: CreateDomain
CreateDomain.description: Grants permission to create a Domain

CreateProfile.name: CreateProfile
CreateProfile.description: Grants permission to create a profile in the domain

DeleteDomain.name: DeleteDomain
DeleteDomain.description: Grants permission to delete a Domain

DeleteIntegration.name: DeleteIntegration
DeleteIntegration.description: Grants permission to delete a integration in a domain

DeleteProfile.name: DeleteProfile
DeleteProfile.description: Grants permission to delete a profile

DeleteProfileKey.name: DeleteProfileKey
DeleteProfileKey.description: Grants permission to delete a profile key

DeleteProfileObject.name: DeleteProfileObject
DeleteProfileObject.description: Grants permission to delete a profile object

DeleteProfileObjectType.name: DeleteProfileObjectType
DeleteProfileObjectType.description: Grants permission to delete a specific profile object type in the domain

GetDomain.name: GetDomain
GetDomain.description: Grants permission to get a specific domain in an account

GetIntegration.name: GetIntegration
GetIntegration.description: Grants permission to get a specific integrations in a domain

GetProfileObjectType.name: GetProfileObjectType
GetProfileObjectType.description: Grants permission to get a specific profile object type in the domain

GetProfileObjectTypeTemplate.name: GetProfileObjectTypeTemplate
GetProfileObjectTypeTemplate.description: Grants permission to get a specific object type template

ListAccountIntegrations.name: ListAccountIntegrations
ListAccountIntegrations.description: Grants permission to list all the integrations in the account

ListDomains.name: ListDomains
ListDomains.description: Grants permission to list all the domains in an account

ListIntegrations.name: ListIntegrations
ListIntegrations.description: Grants permission to list all the integrations in a specific domain

ListProfileObjectTypeTemplates.name: ListProfileObjectTypeTemplates
ListProfileObjectTypeTemplates.description: Grants permission to list all the profile object type templates in the account

ListProfileObjectTypes.name: ListProfileObjectTypes
ListProfileObjectTypes.description: Grants permission to list all the profile object types in the domain

ListProfileObjects.name: ListProfileObjects
ListProfileObjects.description: Grants permission to list all the profile objects for a profile

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

PutIntegration.name: PutIntegration
PutIntegration.description: Grants permission to put a integration in a domain

PutProfileObject.name: PutProfileObject
PutProfileObject.description: Grants permission to put an object for a profile

PutProfileObjectType.name: PutProfileObjectType
PutProfileObjectType.description: Grants permission to put a specific profile object type in the domain

SearchProfiles.name: SearchProfiles
SearchProfiles.description: Grants permission to search for profiles in a domain

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to adds tags to a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

UpdateDomain.name: UpdateDomain
UpdateDomain.description: Grants permission to update a Domain

UpdateProfile.name: UpdateProfile
UpdateProfile.description: Grants permission to update a profile in the domain
